section.title: &MiKTeXPortable;
section.para: The new portable edition allows you to run &MiKTeX; from a portable storage device:

listitem.para: you carry &MiKTeX; on a portable storage device for use on any &Windows; computer
configuration settings are stored on the portable storage device and not in the &WindowsRegistry; of the host computer
by using &MiKTeXPortable;, you leave no traces on the host computer
you do not need administrator privileges on the host computer

section.para: Please visit the &MiKTeXPortable; Homepage, for more information.

section.title: &TeXworks;
section.para: The &MiKTeX; distribution now includes &TeXworks;, an integrated development environment for &TeX; and &LaTeX;.
&TeXworks; includes a text editor, a previewer, syntax highlighting, spell checking, Unicode support.
